description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
AMD GPU Support
- AMD Software: Adrenalin™ Edition ROCm 7.1.1 Preview driver is recommended for this release and supports the use of --use-pytorch-cross-attention flag. This support is expected to be merged into the mainline branch in an upcoming AMD Software: Adrenalin™ Edition release.
- For Windows users only: 96GB Variable Graphics Memory setting may be unstable on AMD Ryzen™ AI Max+ systems. 64GB Variable Graphics Memory is the optimal configuration. An update to how AMD Variable Graphics Memory is managed in Windows is expected to fix this in an upcoming AMD Software: Adrenalin™ Edition release.
- For users with AMD Ryzen™ AI 300 and 400 series systems with 32GB memory please use "--disable-pinned-memory" flag with 8GB AMD Variable Graphics Memory for optimal performance.
- For users with AMD Ryzen™ AI 300 and 400 series systems with 24GB memory please use "--disable-pinned-memory" flag with 8GB AMD Variable Graphics Memory for optimal performance
What's Changed
- Switch FE npm to pnpm by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1502
- Fix todesktop workflow with optional fe branch by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1503
- Add AMD GPU Support by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1501
- Bump desktop-ui to v0.0.6 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1505
- bump core to 0.7.0 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1506
- bump v to 0.7.0 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1507
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0
